#define IOCTL_VPS_CTRL_SET_VPE_LAZY_LOADING   (VPS_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0000U)

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_VPS_CTRL_SET_VPE_LAZY_LOADING   (VPS_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0000U)

Enable/disable Lazy Loading for a scaler.

This IOCTL should be called only when the VPE instance corresponding to vpeInstId is not opened. Otherwise this IOCTL will return error.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] const Vps_ScLazyLoadingParams *
cmdStatusArgs[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID_SOK on success, else failure
